name: AI: Raining Cats and Dogs
description:
Please wait a little second

You are hired by an Artificial Intelligence Company

...

As an Intern

...

Referrence book says,

Arrow to move LEFT and RIGHT

Z to fire Blue ACCEPT bullets

X to fire Red  REJECT bullets

Space to Reset

=======================================================

Because our game AI: Raining Cats and Dogs is too difficult to play, but I hope everyone can enjoy whole game.

So we reduce the difficult.
